content.raw:
The pr2 model tar file is 24MB, quite big to download, and that means the test wil have a dependency on internet connection. 

We could put the pr2 model in the test directory but this would increase the gazebo size though. We could replace all meshes with fake unit_boxes just for the test?
content.html:
The pr2 model tar file is 24MB, quite big to download, and that means the test wil have a dependency on internet connection.

We could put the pr2 model in the test directory but this would increase the gazebo size though. We could replace all meshes with fake unit_boxes just for the test?
